item.title: ..Another lovely problem =)
item.dc:creator: @manmanner manmanner
item.description:
@manmanner wrote:

[quote="`ExiledScape, post:1, topic:277538"]I’ve got everything right.“I see you want to use our altar for prayer.”,
“Well you have to pay 100m”, 2588);

Why wont it delete my coins?

Instead it just says “You do not have enough coins”.

When I have 999m in my inventory.

Yes, I’ve tried 100m exact.

Here is my method;

Client.java

Explaination plox <3

[code]case 242:
talk3(“So, “+ playerName +””,

break;
case 243:
talk(“Would you like to pay 100m?”, 2588);
break;
case 244:
choice(“Okay, Here”, “No thanks”);
break;
case 245:
talk2(“Thank you for the donation.”, “You can now use our altar for prayer experience!”, 2588);
q4 = 15;
prayDonComp();
break;[/code]

NpcDialogue == 242 || NpcDialogue == 243) {

clickingMost

c.NpcDialogue == 241 || c.NpcDialogue == 244){

if(c.q4 == 1 && !c.playerHasItem(995, 100000000)){ c.closeAll(); c.NpcDialogue = 245; c.NpcDialogueSend = false; c.deleteItem(995, 100000000); } else { c.closeAll(); c.sM("You do not have enough coins."); }

Explanation pl0x <3[/quote]

if(c.q4 == 1 && !c.playerHasItem(995, 100000000)){

item.title: ..Another lovely problem =)
item.dc:creator: @_ExiledScape `ExiledScape
item.description:
@_ExiledScape wrote:

I’ve got everything right.

Why wont it delete my coins?

Instead it just says “You do not have enough coins”.

When I have 999m in my inventory.

Yes, I’ve tried 100m exact.

Here is my method;

Client.java

case 242: talk3("So, "+ playerName +"", "I see you want to use our altar for prayer.", "Well you have to pay 100m", 2588); break; case 243: talk("Would you like to pay 100m?", 2588); break; case 244: choice("Okay, Here", "No thanks"); break; case 245: talk2("Thank you for the donation.", "You can now use our altar for prayer experience!", 2588); q4 = 15; prayDonComp(); break;

NpcDialogue == 242 || NpcDialogue == 243) {

clickingMost

c.NpcDialogue == 241 || c.NpcDialogue == 244){

if(c.q4 == 1 && !c.playerHasItem(995, 100000000)){ c.closeAll(); c.NpcDialogue = 245; c.NpcDialogueSend = false; c.deleteItem(995, 100000000); } else { c.closeAll(); c.sM("You do not have enough coins."); }

Explanation pl0x <3
